description:
I met Ricky at a local sports bar. He was with his friend watching a game and he was rooting for the opposite team. Right away I noticed how cute his smile was and I loved how his muscular arms flexed every time something exciting happened during the game!
Ricky is 20 years old, 5’10" tall, and he sports an amazingly cut body. However, his best feature is his tight, muscular ass. It's perfectly round with a just a little bit of hair in the crack. I could literally spend all day with my face in there!
title: Ricky
